# ABOUT US
SynergyFinder is developed by the [Network Pharmacology for Precision Medicine](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/researchgroups/network-pharmacology-for-precision-medicine) in the [Research Programs Unit (RPU)](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/faculty-of-medicine/research-programs-unit), the [Faculty of Medicine](https://www.helsinki.fi/en/faculty-of-medicine) at the [University of Helsinki](https://www.helsinki.fi/en), Helsinki, Finland.

SynergyFinder is an interactive to evaluate the significance of combined drugs, the observed drug combination responses are usually
with expected responses calculated by using synergy scoring models deviation of observed and expected responses one may classify the drug combination as synergistic or antagonistic. It provides efficient implementations for all the popular synergy scoring models, including HSA, Loewe, Bliss and ZIP to quantify the degree of drug synergy.
